positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain enrollment leadership through clear guidance and confident ownership of action steps
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of immediate alternative options and clear intake pathways that transform timeline constraints
positive.explanation2: Effective conversion of payment concerns into actionable solutions through confident presentation of options

improvement.explanation: Enhanced focus needed on converting information-sharing moments into immediate enrollment actions
improvement.explanation1: Stronger emphasis required on maintaining enrollment momentum when redirecting to alternative programs
improvement.explanation2: More structured approach needed for converting extended timelines into specific engagement commitments

conversations.title: Effective Timeline Control
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: We can't enroll you for March, but we can enroll you for May. So now we are enrolling for May
conversations.student_response: I was checking if there is any chance that I could get to this in March
conversations.consultant_adaptation: You just pay per unit or you can put it all onto FeeHelp which is a student loan
conversations.recommended_improvement: Add specific next steps to secure May enrollment while interest is high

goal_setting.title: Effective Timeline Control
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant redirected effectively but missed opportunity for immediate commitment
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed clear interest in immediate enrollment
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant provided options without securing specific commitments
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have secured immediate commitment for May intake while interest was high
